snippet.title: The Edge of Allegoria - Demo Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
The Edge of Allegoria is a nostalgic adventure for the 90’s kids who grew up playing handheld, turn-based RPG's, who aren't exactly kids anymore.

FREE DEMO COMING FEBRUARY 24, 2023!!!
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870700/The_Edge_of_Allegoria/

Itch.io
https://avg-joe4.itch.io/the-edge-of-allegoria-demo-version
